entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzer diagnostics are swallowed if first symbol location happened to be in generated code #69543
  • Assert when typing `await foreach` #69539
    17.8
  • IntelliSense incorrectly hard-selects `struct` after `record` #69537
  • Completion doesn't offer `method` completion for class with a primary constructor #69535

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34016.170 #69571
  • 3.1% allocations of `TypeConversions` #68997
    Compiler.Next
  • Extra closing parenthesis in local function breaks parsing for the rest of the file #58529
    Backlog
  • NRE in NullableWalker while editing code #67816
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Support creating binlogs for the language server's design time builds #69572
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23416.3 #69570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23412.1 #69569
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23408.8 #69568
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23406.1 #69567
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23403.1 #69566
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23401.10 #69565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove use of Environment.CurrentDirectory #69564
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23378.8 #69563
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23376.7 #69562
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23374.10 #69561
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23374.5 #69560
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23372.1 #69559
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23371.1 #69558
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23369.14 #69557
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23369.13 #69556
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23368.11 #69555
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23364.3 #69554
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23362.1 #69553
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23360.9 #69552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23357.7 #69551
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23356.8 #69550
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23330.5 #69549
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.7.0-3.23366.1 #69548
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Filter out abstract types from the list of collection-initializable types #69546
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Consolidate code paths that create update edits #69545
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Update compiler toolset to latest #69544
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for reporting non-local LSP pull document diagnostics for open documents #69541
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid treating methods as SymbolCategory.Other #69540
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets - make `foreach` snippet work with `await` and async enumerables #69538
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Recommend `method` on primary constructors #69536
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix compliance warnings for NuGet packages #69547
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update 17.7 servicing branch queue #69528
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce `TypeConversions` allocations by caching them in AssemblySymbol #69040
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Explicitly filter down to constructible types before offering fixes #69542
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add formatting test for empty collection literal. #69534
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve error recovery when encountering errant close-paren tokens. #69482
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add analyzer/fixer to suggest changing code like `ImmutableArray.CreateBuilder<int>(); ...` to a collection expression. #69500
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Unsplit `NullableWalker` after `out` argument #69511
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, Next
  • Fix reassigned-variable-underlining with primary constructors #69530
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Extract a shared helper for walking statements for a few analyzers #69524
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Collection expressions: use inline arrays for collection expressions with span target types #69412
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2245608 #69366
  • Move csharp decompiler service down to features so it is available in vscode #69501
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pool lexed token arrays in SyntaxParser. #69499
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Prototype of a public API (though currently internal) for roslyn features to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid binding lambda body if fully typed #69505
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add BuildOnlyDiagnosticIds LSP request handler #69475
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Stop descending through tuple when no slot can be created #69513
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Fix TFM for function pointer expected output tests #69506
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
